price: (55) Call upon your Lord in humility and privately; indeed, He does not like transgressors.[379]
arabic: ٱدۡعُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ تَضَرُّعٗا وَخُفۡيَةًۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: id'ʿū rabbakum taḍarruʿan wakhuf'yatan innahu lā yuḥibbu al-muʿ'tadīna
